import axios from 'axios' import React, { useContext } from 'react' import RecipesContext from "../ourContext" const AddR = () => { const listrecipe=useContext(RecipesContext).listrecipe const setlistrecipe=useContext(RecipesContext).setlistrecipe const add=()=>{ let y=listrecipe axios.put('http://localhost:1234/Recipes/addRecipe',listrecipe).then(l=>{setlistrecipe(l.data)}) } return (
setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,name:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,description:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,pic:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,level:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,duration:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,type:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,id:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,component:e.target.value})}> add()}>
) } export default AddR
